name: Line Up Battle
description:
Made for GMTK Joined Together Jam.

Join enemies of the same type into a line of three to remove them from the board.

To perform an action, hold down the appropriate number key.  Valid tiles will light up when you mouse over them.  Click to select the tile.

[1] Move the wizard.

[2] Push an enemy next to the wizard.  Enemies behind it will also be pushed, as long as there is room.  Enemies cannot move into the same tile or off of the board.

[3] Pull enemies towards the tile from up to two spaces out (no diagonals).  Priority goes clockwise for the inner tiles, then the outer tiles.

Every 3 actions any enemies next to you will damage you.

Remove 9 groups of enemies to win.
